altername_name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 67: The Soccer: Dynamite Soccer 1500
name: Dynamite Soccer 98
overview: Football game combines exhilarating sense of speed and exceptional high degree of freedom to players move at will in a variety of actions. Freedom in the operation of the five formations of 70 positions. In addition, free and 360 free ?Seru path, you can enjoy the game in the sense of direct manipulation was achieved by processing high-speed frame. The game features 3 different kind of stadiums, 2 different camera angles & up to 4 human players can play at the same time using the multi-tap function.
